title: Can't purchase RP?
body: I tried purchasing RP today but it the Purchase RP tab takes forever to load, and once it did the icons for Paypal and credit cards didn't load, and I couldn't click them. I've tried to purchase it on my other computer to no success. Any suggestions?

replies.body: Try flushing your DNS and renewing your IP. Instructions [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10) for Windows.
